attributes.title: Horrible!!
attributes.review: If you’re looking for news we’ll look somewhere else this is horrible and fake. They give you new that they want you to know but nothing else🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Spencer Reid murdered me and my mom
attributes.review: My name is hannah and My mom downloaded this app because she heard a rumor Spencer Reid would appear at your house. I was outside when he appeared and started brutally murdering me, then he killed my mother. dont download if you dont want to die

attributes.title: The App Tried To Kill My Cat 🥺🥺🥺🥺
attributes.review: So I was tapping away on the app, because “Karen Rump 2020”, so basically a drone came and took my cat away 🥺🥺🥺🥺 and I had to throw stuff at it because using guns is bad for a drone 🤡 any-who my cat is okay 😊 and I now want to de download this bleh app 😀

attributes.title: You should keep this app🌸🧚🏻‍♀️🥰 off the AppStore 🧚🏻‍♀️🌸🍃
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible how can you support an app with a Trump on it. There shouldn’t be an app for the clown we call a president🤡. If he wants to ban TikTok then his app can be banned to and all his little trumpsters. Free Barron 2020!!!!!

attributes.title: Instructions unclear: made my house blow up.
attributes.review: If you care about your family, friends, pets, and belongings then don’t get this app. This app attracts arsonists who set fire to my beloved home. Now I’m an orphan with no house. Thanks a lot trump.

attributes.title: Scam
attributes.review: I really thought it was gonna be a great app but just like the president it’s not🤭✨my phone keeps lagging when it’s on the app and I don’t wanna get hacked by Russia so please apple make us a favor and eliminate this app completely!

attributes.title: ✨garbage✨
attributes.review: I downloaded it think it was a well informed page of our presidents platform but it ended up being about a racist oompa loompa with bad hair. 10/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP! 👁💧👄💧👁
attributes.review: This app is horrible. When I first went on it a photo of a the Cheeto man popped up on my lock screen and I DONT WANT IT THERE! Then fairy comments changed the names of my contacts and now I don’t know who I’m texting. HELP PLEASE! 🧚‍♀️🥰😘🧚‍♀️👑✨💅❤️🥰👑✌️💅🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️✨ OH NO THERE IT GOES AGAIN

i just wanted to support our lovely president 🥰🥰so i go to download this app 🤩🤩 and it took a solid 5 HOURS to download 😖😖 and it took up ALL of my storage 😟😟 0/10 would not recommend 🥱🥱 wasted my time 😴😴

attributes.title: Worse the 1 star
attributes.review: If I could give this app a 0 star review I would. After hearing our president say that my city (Detroit) was like hell I couldn’t see a man that degrades his own country should be in charge of it.
